name: Thay đồ công túa
description:
*Note: This game only can be played in WINDOW or LINUX operating systems

*Introduction: 

-Genre: dress up game :<

-Rules: You have 3 seconds to remember what the princess is wearing, then you will have to choose the pants, top, shoes, hairstyle for the princess so that it matches what she is wearing initially.

-Games for entertainment purposes :D. Have fun!

*Developers: Nguyễn Thanh Bình, Lê Minh Quân
